headline: Tapestry (TPR) Has Done Remarkable Things, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 12 Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. Tapestry, Inc. (NYSE:TPR) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar. Tapestry, Inc. (NYSE:TPR) is a luxury goods company. Its shares are up by 89% over the past year and by 17.8% year-to-date. UBS discussed the firm in late January as it raised the share […]

headline: Lumentum, Woodward, And Teradyne Are Among the Top 10 Large-Cap Gainers Last Week (Feb. 2-Feb. 6): Are the Others in Your Portfolio?
summary: Last week's top large-cap gainers surged on strong earnings beats and upbeat guidance (LITE, XPO, RRX, WWD, TPR), analyst upgrades (TER), oil-linked transport tailwinds (SAIA), and major catalysts like positive trial data (ROIV) and a new U.S. Army contract (OSK).
